row.name: UC4RB_NW_TCPREQ_CONN_TIMEOUT#

row.name: UC4RB_NW_TCPREQ_STAY_OPEN_TIME#
row.xui: <integer enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_NW_TCPREQ_STAY_OPEN_TIMEs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Stay open timeframe" tooltip="If the connection is not closed by the target host automatically, the connection stays open for a certain time specified by this parameter. All messages sent back by the target host in between this timeframe are returned by this runbook function. After the time runs out the connection is closed and the function returns." alt="1"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry><entry name="text">Stay open timeframe</entry><entry name="min"/><entry name="max"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_NW_TCPREQ_STAY_OPEN_TIMEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">If the connection is not closed by the target host automatically, the connection stays open for a certain time specified by this parameter. All messages sent back by the target host in between this timeframe are returned by this runbook function. After the time runs out the connection is closed and the function returns.</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/></properties></integer>
